price: 20. Mpe ya soló, nazali koluka libateli epai ya Nkolo wa ngai, mpe Nkolo wa bino. Mpo ete bobamba ngai mabanga te.
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
